channel.title: Farm Exp
channel.description: Hey guys, I just came across an amazing farming method that takes no time at all. This will help you get those pesky quest requirements out of the way, and get you closer to planting some great herbs for profit such as ranarr and snapdragon. Here is all you have to do. There are these items called "Grand seed pod". What they do is teleport you to the top of the grand tree, after a 6 or so second delay. But, what nobody notices is that you get 100XP per pod that you click. The trick is you HAVE to log out to lobby, right after clicking the seed. This way the gnome does not come and teleport you to the grand tree, where you cannot use the seed because it is indoors. Yes, you CANNOT use these indoors, so make sure you're outside before using :p. These are about 2k right now in the grand exchange, and buy almost instantly, but be patient nonetheless. 45 Farming is about 61,000 exp. that equates to 610 pods. You can use 7 pods per minutes using this method. That's 42,000 farming experience in one hour without planting a single seed. Good luck on farming! HUGE UPDATE Ok i just found out that you can glitch these. Go to the duel arena on the top of the brown walkway to the top. Stand here, and use the seed. THE GNOME WILL NOT BE ABLE TO REACH YOU, and you still get EXP! [b] With an autoclicker set at 1 Millisecond per click, I was able to use 70 seeds in just under one minute! That is 7k exp per minute, 420k exp per hour! Try it out this is amazing!!!! [/b]

@kickingjamie wrote:

Damn I wish I got some xp from this…

item.title: Farm Exp
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

8,4M for 420k xp, well isn’t that just fucking useless.

4.8M for 420k xp doing yew trees… The difference is a few hours of irl. I could take an hour of work, buy rsgp (what is that, 70mill?) and train farming for a few hours and have the levels instantly or I could slowly do it with trees and double or triple waste of time.

Or I could sit there and buy some items and have the price of them drop on me while I sit there in varrock talking to people.

Just saying, you can analyze rs differently

As johan pointed out, patched.

Read full topic

@Speljohan wrote:

item.title: Farm Exp
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Hey guys, I just came across an amazing farming method that takes no time at all. This will help you get those pesky quest requirements out of the way, and get you closer to planting some great herbs for profit such as ranarr and snapdragon.

Here is all you have to do. There are these items called “Grand seed pod”. What they do is teleport you to the top of the grand tree, after a 6 or so second delay. But, what nobody notices is that you get 100XP per pod that you click. The trick is you HAVE to log out to lobby, right after clicking the seed. This way the gnome does not come and teleport you to the grand tree, where you cannot use the seed because it is indoors. Yes, you CANNOT use these indoors, so make sure you’re outside before using :p.

These are about 2k right now in the grand exchange, and buy almost instantly, but be patient nonetheless.

45 Farming is about 61,000 exp. that equates to 610 pods. You can use 7 pods per minutes using this method. That’s 42,000 farming experience in one hour without planting a single seed. Good luck on farming!

HUGE UPDATE
Ok i just found out that you can glitch these. Go to the duel arena on the top of the brown walkway to the top. Stand here, and use the seed. THE GNOME WILL NOT BE ABLE TO REACH YOU, and you still get EXP!

With an autoclicker set at 1 Millisecond per click, I was able to use 70 seeds in just under one minute! That is 7k exp per minute, 420k exp per hour! Try it out this is amazing!!!
